atk-s0305a:281_1: Catutthe mettāsahagatena cetasātiādi sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0305a:281_3: sāvakānaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desemāti idampi te purimanayeneva satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā vadanti.
atk-s0305a:281_4: Titthiyānañhi samaye pañcanīvaraṇappahānaṃ vā mettādibrahmavihārabhāvanā vā natthi.
atk-s0305a:281_5: Kiṃ gatikā hotīti kiṃ nipphatti hoti.
atk-s0305a:282_6: Asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto.
atk-s0305a:282_10: Paṭikūle pana aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a:282_15: Appaṭikūlappaṭikūlesu hi tadeva asubhapharaṇaṃ vā aniccanti manasikāraṃ vā karonto paṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a:282_16: Paṭikūlāpaṭikūlesu ca tadeva mettāpharaṇaṃ vā dhātumanasikāraṃ vā karonto appaṭikūlasaññī viharati nāma.
atk-s0305a:282_17: “Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṃ pavattayamāno “appaṭikūle
atk-s0305a:282_18: ca paṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:283_0: Ettāvatā ca imassa bhikkhuno mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0305a:283_1: arahattaṃ pattassa saha vipassanāya maggasambojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyiddhiyā ca dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā siyā.
atk-s0305a:283_2: Idaṃ pana mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasantopi yo arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:283_3: yasmā tassa arahattaparamā mettā na hoti.
atk-s0305a:283_6: Tasmā tassa dassanatthaṃ ayaṃ desanā āraddhā.
atk-s0305a:283_7: Parato sabbaso vā pana rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīsupi iminā nayena puna desanārambhapayojanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:285_0: Kasmā panetāsaṃ mettādīnaṃ subhaparamāditā vuttā bhagavatāti?
atk-s0305a:285_3: athassa appaṭikūlaparicayā appaṭikūlesu parisuddhavaṇṇesu nīlādīsu cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a:286_0: Karuṇāvihārissa uṇhābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ sattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassa karuṇāya pavattisambhavato rūpe ādīnavo parividito hoti,
atk-s0305a:286_1: athassa parividitarūpādīnavattā pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññataraṃ ugghāṭetvā rūpanissaraṇe ākāse cittaṃ upasaṃharato
atk-s0305a:287_0: Muditāvihārissa pana tena tena pāmojjakāraṇena uppannapāmojjasattānaṃ viññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa muditāya
atk-s0305a:287_2: athassa anukkamādhigataṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ atikkamma ākāsanimittagocare viññāṇe cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a:288_2: sampattasukhato vā mā vigacchantū”ti ābhogābhāvato sukhadukkhādiparamatthagāhavimukhasambhavato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:288_3: Athassa paramatthagāhato vimukhabhāvaparicitacittassa paramatthato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhacittassa ca
atk-s0305a:288_4: anukkamādhigataṃ viññāṇāñcāyatanaṃ samatikkammasambhavato avijjamāne paramatthabhūtassa viññāṇassa abhāve
atk-s0305a:288_5: cittaṃ upasaṃharato appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati.
atk-s0305a:290_4: Nissaraṇanti tividhaṃ kāmarāgassa nissaraṇaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ samucchedanissaraṇanti.
atk-s0305a:290_9: Attatthampītiādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho attattho nāma,
atk-s0305a:291_1: byāpādassa nissaraṇantiādīsu hi dveva nissaraṇāni vikkhambhananissaraṇañca samucchedanissaraṇañca.
atk-s0305a:291_2: Tattha byāpādassa tāva mettāya paṭhamajjhānaṃ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0305a:292_0: Yā panettha seyyathāpi brāhmaṇa udapatto saṃsaṭṭho lākhāya vātiādikā upamā vuttā,
atk-s0305a:292_5: Sevālapaṇakapariyonaddhoti tilabījakādibhedena sevālena vā nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena vā udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā nibbattapaṇakena pariyonaddho.
atk-s0305a:292_11: Imasmiṃ sutte bhagavā tīhi bhavehi desanaṃ nivattetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0305a:294_2: Taggha bhagavā nīvaraṇāti ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇā.
atk-s0305a:294_5: Sopi me paṭippassaddhoti tassa kira satthu santike sītalaṃ utusappāyaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa kāyadaratho paṭipassambhi,
atk-s0305a:294_7: Apica maggenevassa etaṃ ubhayampi passaddhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:297_1: Sattamādīsu aṭṭhikasaññāti aṭṭhikaṃ aṭṭhikanti bhāventassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a:297_2: Taṃ panetaṃ bhāvayato yāva nimittaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:297_4: Nimitte pana uppanne chavicammāni neva upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0305a:297_5: saṅkhavaṇṇo suddhaaṭṭhikasaṅghāṭova upaṭṭhāti hatthikkhandhagataṃ dhammikatissarājānaṃ olokentassa sāmaṇerassa viya,
atk-s0305a:297_6: paṭimagge hasamānaṃ itthiṃ olokentassa cetiyapabbatavāsino tissattherassa viya cāti.
atk-s0305a:297_8: Sati vā upādiseseti gahaṇasese upādānasese vijjamānamhi.
atk-s0305a:299_3: Vinicchayakathā panettha saddhiṃ bhāvanānayena visuddhimagge vuttā.
atk-s0305a:302_3: maraṇapaṭibaddhaṃ me jīvita”nti abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a:302_5: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññāti sakalalokasmiṃ anabhiratiṃ uppādentassa uppannasaññā.
atk-s0305a:307_1: Satipaṭṭhānasaṃyuttassa paṭhame ambapālivaneti ambapāliyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyā ropite ambavane.
atk-s0305a:307_3: Sā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacittā tattha vihāraṃ kāretvā tathāgatassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a:309_0: Nāvā uttarasetū ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0305a:311_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya.
atk-s0305a:311_1: Sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyāti sokassa ca paridevassa ca samatikkamāya,
atk-s0305a:311_3: Dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya,
atk-s0305a:311_5: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti ñāyo vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo,
atk-s0305a:311_7: Ayañhi pubbabhāge lokiyo satipaṭṭhānamaggo bhāvito lokuttaramaggassa adhigamāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0305a:311_9: Nibbānassa sacchikiriyāyāti taṇhāvānavirahitattā nibbānanti laddhanāmassa amatassa sacchikiriyāya,
atk-s0305a:311_11: Ayañhi maggo bhāvito anupubbena nibbānasacchikiriyaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0305a:312_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā sattahi padehi ekāyanamaggassa vaṇṇo bhāsito,
atk-s0305a:312_9: nibbānanti tayo visese āvahatī”ti ussāhajātā imaṃ desanaṃ uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:312_12: Iti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi kambalavāṇijādayo kambalādīnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0305a:313_6: tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatāpi, satipi.
atk-s0305a:313_9: satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmi taṃ suṇātha. Ko ca,
atk-s0305a:313_12: Āharasamudayā kāyasamudayo”tiādīsu hi satigocaro satipaṭṭhānanti vutto.
atk-s0305a:314_2: yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī”ti ettha tidhā paṭipannesu sāvakesu satthuno paṭighānunayavītivattatā satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:315_0: “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:315_7: iti sati ca sā paṭṭhānañcātipi satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0305a:316_5: Catassopi hi etā satiyo magganaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:316_9: Catassopi cetā aparabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu kiccaṃ sādhayamānā nibbānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0305a:316_10: ādito paṭṭhāya ca nibbānatthikehi maggiyantīti tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā.
atk-s0305a:316_11: Evañca sati vacanānusandhinā sānusandhikāva desanā hoti.
atk-s0305a:317_4: Ayañhi bhikkhu imaṃ kāyaṃ aniccānupassanādīnaṃ sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccato anupassati,
atk-s0305a:317_18: So taṃ aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0305a:318_1: Ātāpīti tīsu bhavesu kilese ātapatīti ātāpo,
atk-s0305a:318_6: Ayaṃ pana yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati.
atk-s0305a:318_7: Na hi sativirahitassa anupassanā nāma atthi,
atk-s0305a:318_11: Tasmā ettha “kāye kāyānupassī viharatī”ti ettāvatā kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:318_12: Atha vā yasmā anātāpino antosaṅkhepo antarāyakaro hoti,
atk-s0305a:318_14: muṭṭhassati upāyāpariccāge anupāyāpariggahe ca asamattho hoti,
atk-s0305a:318_16: Tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ sampajjati,
atk-s0305a:318_17: tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “ātāpī sampajāno satimā”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:319_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sampayogaṅgañjassa dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:319_1: Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā vinayitvā.
atk-s0305a:319_3: Kāyo hi idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippeto.
atk-s0305a:319_4: Yasmā panassa na kāyamatteyeva abhijjhādomanassaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0305a:319_7: Lokasaṅkhātattā vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:319_11: Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ vineyyāti evaṃ sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:323_0: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, upasanto carissatī”ti.
atk-s0305a:325_2: Dhammā salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇānaṃ suññatadhammassa aniccādisattaanupassanānaṃ “santaṃ vā ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0305a:325_6: vitthāro pana dīghamajjhimaṭṭhakathāsu satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:327_3: Abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:327_6: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṃ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a:327_8: Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṃ purato onamanto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a:327_10: Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsanassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṃsaranto abhikkamati nāma,
atk-s0305a:329_4: Tattha abhikkamanacitte uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā “kiṃ nu me ettha gatena attho atthi,
atk-s0305a:329_8: saṅghadassanena saṅghārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a:329_9: Mahāvihārasmiñhi dakkhiṇadvāre ṭhatvā mahācetiyaṃ olokentā tiṃsasahassabhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0305a:330_1: mahācetiyassa samantā kucchivedikāya heṭṭhimabhāgato paṭṭhāya paññāyanaṭṭhāne yattha yattha dve pādā sakkā honti samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0305a:330_2: tattha tattha ekapaduddhāre tiṃsatiṃsa bhikkhusahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti sakkā vatu”nti.
atk-s0305a:330_5: There disvā tesaṃ ovāde patiṭṭhāya asubhaṃ disvā tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā tadeva khayato sammasanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0305a:331_0: Tasmiṃ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:331_3: Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare parisā sannipatanti,
atk-s0305a:331_4: attano vibhavānurūpā itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti.
atk-s0305a:331_13: Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā sabbarattiṃ dhammassavanaṃ kārentesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto ceva antarāyo ca hoti,
atk-s0305a:332_2: eko kira daharabhikkhu sāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato.
atk-s0305a:332_3: Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto asubhaṃ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:332_4: saṅkhāre sammasanto tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:332_6: “mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā,
atk-s0305a:332_10: iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṃ puratthābhimukhā hutvā olokethā”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:332_11: So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a:332_12: Evaṃ ekaṃ asubhaṃ dvinnaṃ janānaṃ atthāya jātaṃ.
atk-s0305a:332_13: Evaṃ sātthampi panetaṃ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṃ asappāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a:333_0: Evaṃ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu attano cittarucikaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0305a:333_1: gocaraṃ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṃ gahetvāva gamanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:334_3: ekacco pana neva harati na paccāharati,
atk-s0305a:335_0: Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā tathā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ majjhimayāme seyyaṃ kappetvā,
atk-s0305a:335_2: pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṃ katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṃ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a:335_4: So sarīraparikammaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṃ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjitvā
atk-s0305a:335_5: bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:335_6: manasikarontova cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:335_9: sopānapādamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṃ viya taṃ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ cetiyaṃ ce,
atk-s0305a:335_10: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:335_12: tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:335_13: Cetiyaṃ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpi buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-s0305a:335_14: So evaṃ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitabhaṇḍakaṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya
atk-s0305a:335_15: nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati.
atk-s0305a:336_0: Atha naṃ manussā disvā “ayyo no āgato”ti paccuggantvā pattaṃ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā yāva bhattaṃ na niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0305a:336_1: tāva pāde dhovitvā makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṃ vā pucchanti,
atk-s0305a:336_4: janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevāti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti.
atk-s0305a:336_6: tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva dhammaṃ kathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā
atk-s0305a:336_7: nivattiyamānehipi manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0305a:337_0: Atha naṃ puretaraṃ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti.
atk-s0305a:337_1: Porāṇakabhikkhū kira na “amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ācariyo”ti mukhaṃ oloketvā vattaṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a:337_13: edisā nāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthī”ti tesaṃ guṇe kathayanto gacchati.
atk-s0305a:338_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṃ vattapaṭipattiṃ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-s0305a:338_4: so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṃ vanditvā gorūpānaṃ nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṃ yāgubhikkhāya
atk-s0305a:338_5: pavisitvā yāguṃ labhitvā āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivati.
atk-s0305a:338_6: Athassa dvittikkhattuṃ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejo upādiṇṇakaṃ muñcitvā anupādiṇṇakaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0305a:338_7: ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṃ patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṃ paribhuñjitvā pattañca
atk-s0305a:338_8: mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena
atk-s0305a:338_9: āhāraṃ paribhuñjitvā tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ upaṭṭhahamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-s0305a:338_11: Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṃ pivitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā buddhasāsane arahattaṃ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā.
atk-s0305a:338_12: Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu gāmesu āsanasālāyaṃ na taṃ āsanamatthi,
atk-s0305a:338_13: yattha yāguṃ pivitvā arahattaṃ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-s0305a:339_1: sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetovinibandhabaddhacitto viharanto “kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”tipi saññaṃ
atk-s0305a:339_2: akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho
atk-s0305a:339_4: Ayaṃ vuccati neva harati na paccāharatīti.
atk-s0305a:340_0: Yo panāyaṃ harati ca paccāharati cāti vutto,
atk-s0305a:340_2: Attakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṃ katvā viharanti “āvuso,
atk-s0305a:340_7: tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha, ṭhāne,
atk-s0305a:340_10: Te evaṃ katikavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu pāsāṇā honti,
atk-s0305a:340_17: ananucchavikaṃ te eta”nti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tattheva ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati,
atk-s0305a:340_18: tathā asakkonto nisīdatīti so eva nayo.
atk-s0305a:340_20: taṃ kilesaṃ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontova gacchati,
atk-s0305a:340_23: paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaṃyeva eti ālindakavāsī mahāphussadevatthero viya.
atk-s0305a:341_0: So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento eva vihāsi.
atk-s0305a:341_1: Manussāpi sudaṃ antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā theraṃ tathā gacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0305a:341_5: So taṃ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a:341_6: Arahattappattadivase cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṃ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:341_7: Cattāropi mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a:341_8: Tañca obhāsaṃ disvā vanavāsīmahātissatthero taṃ dutiyadivase pucchi –
atk-s0305a:341_11: Thero vikkhepaṃ karonto “obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi hoti,
atk-s0305a:341_13: Tato “paṭicchādetha tumhe”ti nibaddho āmāti paṭijānitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0305a:342_1: Sopi kira gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento paṭhamaṃ tāva “bhagavato mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī”ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:342_2: Puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0305a:342_3: So kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattanto gāmasamīpaṃ gantvā
atk-s0305a:342_4: “gāvī nu pabbajito nū”ti āsaṅkanīyapadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā kacchakarakato udakena pattaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0305a:342_7: “Mā me bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ vā vandituṃ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī”ti “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0305a:342_8: katimī”ti divasaṃ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṃ vā pañhaṃ vā pucchito pana udakaṃ gilitvā āroceti.
atk-s0305a:343_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca.
atk-s0305a:343_3: Gāmañca piṇḍāya pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:343_9: “kiṃ nu kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti,
atk-s0305a:343_13: Etha ne aññamaññaṃ khamāpessāmā”ti sabbe vihāraṃ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṃsu.
atk-s0305a:343_14: Tato yo tesu cakkhumā puriso, so āha –
atk-s0305a:343_20: Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṃ patvā mahāpavāraṇāyaṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresuṃ.
atk-s0305a:344_1: kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā bhikkhū viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṃ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṃ
atk-s0305a:344_2: gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṃ katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-s0305a:344_5: Tattha ca piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena gacchati.
atk-s0305a:344_6: Na hi javena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthi.
atk-s0305a:344_7: Visamabhūmibhāgapattaṃ pana udakasakaṭaṃ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati.
atk-s0305a:344_8: Anugharaṃ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṃ vā adātukāmaṃ vā sallakkhetuṃ tadanurūpaṃ kālaṃ āgamento bhikkhaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0305a:344_9: antogāme vā bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaronto
atk-s0305a:344_12: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya…pe…
atk-s0305a:344_13: bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṃ katvā muhuttaṃ bhattakilamathaṃ paṭipassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṃ,
atk-s0305a:344_14: evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ purimayāmaṃ pacchimayāmañca kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti.
atk-s0305a:344_15: Ayaṃ vuccati harati ca paccāharati cāti.
atk-s0305a:345_0: Imaṃ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṃ gatapaccāgatikavattaṃ pūrento yadi upanissayasampanno hoti,
atk-s0305a:345_13: atha buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti,
atk-s0305a:345_14: seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo mahāpañño vā,
atk-s0305a:345_32: Iti imasmiṃ catukke yvāyaṃ harati paccāharati ca,
atk-s0305a:346_2: idha bhikkhu abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu –
atk-s0305a:346_6: tathā asammuyhanto abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:346_7: iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamati.
atk-s0305a:346_8: Tassevaṃ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a:346_11: vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā,
atk-s0305a:347_0: Tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0305a:347_5: tattha tattheva pabbapabbaṃ sandhisandhi odhiodhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilāni viya taṭataṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-s0305a:352_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:352_2: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato anupekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-s0305a:352_5: Iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevāti.
atk-s0305a:353_0: Tattha “ālokessāmī”ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:353_1: Taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:354_3: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato nābhijjhādomanassā
atk-s0305a:354_11: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ ālokayato’…pe…
atk-s0305a:355_0: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:355_2: tasmā khandhadhātuāyatanakammaṭṭhānikehi attano kamaṭṭhānavaseneva kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:356_0: “Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi,
atk-s0305a:356_1: ‘ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena saddhiṃ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṃ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:356_2: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṃ akkhidalaṃ adho sīdati,
atk-s0305a:356_5: tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ sādhentaṃ uppajjatī”ti evaṃ pajānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññaṃ nāma.
atk-s0305a:360_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṃ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0305a:360_8: ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0305a:360_11: Etesu pana yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesu “ayaṃ itthī,
atk-s0305a:361_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthamāgate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṃ sakakiccanipphādanavasena āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:361_1: taṃ pubbe uppannānaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti.
atk-s0305a:361_2: Tassa yathā paragehe kiñci yācituṃ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesu tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a:361_3: evaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ
atk-s0305a:362_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:362_1: tāni saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti,
atk-s0305a:362_4: Tattha yathā ekasmiṃ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma,
atk-s0305a:362_5: evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṃyeva maraṇadhammassa
atk-s0305a:362_6: javanassāpi rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvavasena asammohasampajaññaṃ
atk-s0305a:363_1: Ettha hi cakkhu ceva rūpā ca rūpakkhandho,
atk-s0305a:363_6: evametesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a:363_13: evametesaṃ catunnaṃ āyatanānaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a:363_20: evametesaṃ catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṃ paññāyati.
atk-s0305a:364_1: Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ akatvā hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṃ pariggaṇhitvā
atk-s0305a:364_3: Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṃ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā vā ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:364_7: Kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā nuppajjanti,
atk-s0305a:365_0: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0305a:365_4: Tattheko daharo hatthaṃ pasārento kāyasaṃsaggaṃ patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto.
atk-s0305a:365_5: Aparo bhikkhu pādaṃ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi,
atk-s0305a:365_11: Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā sappāye pasāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:366_1: mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṃ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjesi.
atk-s0305a:366_3: sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthā”ti.
atk-s0305a:366_6: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
atk-s0305a:366_7: idāni pana tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito,
atk-s0305a:366_8: tasmā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0305a:367_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjanto vā pasārento vā natthi,
atk-s0305a:367_2: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hotīti parijānanaṃ panettha asammohasampajaññanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:368_2: Tattha saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇe tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato āmisalābho,
atk-s0305a:368_3: “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho attho nāma.
atk-s0305a:369_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṃ sukhumaṃ sappāyaṃ,
atk-s0305a:370_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṃ pārupanto natthi,
atk-s0305a:370_6: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya.
atk-s0305a:370_7: Tasmā neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:370_9: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūmavatthādīhi sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a:370_11: Na tehi nāgavammikarukkhādayo somanassaṃ vā karonti domanassaṃ vā.
atk-s0305a:370_12: Evamevaṃ neva sundaraṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:370_13: na asundaraṃ labhitvā domanassanti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:371_1: “imaṃ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti evaṃ pattaggahaṇapaccayā paṭilabhitabbaatthavasena sātthakasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:371_6: Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo.
atk-s0305a:371_8: pana yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0305a:372_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṃ gaṇhanto natthi,
atk-s0305a:372_7: saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattaggahaṇe viyāti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:373_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe anāthasālāya
atk-s0305a:373_1: anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṃ vaṇapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva kapālādīhi bhesajjāni ca upanāmenti.
atk-s0305a:373_6: na te tattha sumanā vā dummanā vā honti.
atk-s0305a:373_7: Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena bhesajjapaṭiggahamatteneva ca kapālakena tesaṃ attho.
atk-s0305a:373_8: Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṃ viya cīvaraṃ,
atk-s0305a:373_10: kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṃ sallakkheti.
atk-s0305a:374_4: Tattha “neva davāyā”tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi attho attho nāma,
atk-s0305a:375_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a:376_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi,
atk-s0305a:376_2: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte otāraṇaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a:376_4: Na koci kuñcikāya na yantakena hanukaṭṭhīni vivarati,
atk-s0305a:376_5: cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṃ uparidantānaṃ musalakiccasādhanaṃ heṭṭhādantānaṃ
atk-s0305a:376_9: Taṃ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṃ kheḷaudakatemitaṃ uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṃ koci kaṭacchunā
atk-s0305a:376_10: vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:376_12: Paviṭṭhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ koci palālasantharaṃ katvā dhārento nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:376_14: Ṭhitaṃ ṭhitaṃ koci uddhanaṃ katvā aggiṃ jāletvā pacanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:376_16: Pakkaṃ pakkaṃ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā vā bahi nīharako nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:376_18: Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca;
atk-s0305a:376_19: pathavīdhātu dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca;
atk-s0305a:376_23: viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti evaṃ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:377_7: sammakkhanatoti evaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭikūlabhāvaṃ paccavekkhaṇatopettha asammohasampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:378_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe.
atk-s0305a:378_1: Tattha pattakāle uccārapassāvaṃ akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti,
atk-s0305a:378_5: Karontassa pana sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0305a:378_7: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṃ karontassa pana āpatti hoti,
atk-s0305a:378_10: Patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṃ taṃ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:379_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṃ karonto natthi,
atk-s0305a:379_2: Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a:379_3: yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṃ akāmatāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0305a:379_4: evaṃ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti.
atk-s0305a:379_5: So panāyaṃ evaṃ nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa,
atk-s0305a:379_8: Yathā udakatumbato purāṇaudakaṃ chaḍḍentassa neva taṃ attano hoti na paresaṃ,
atk-s0305a:380_7: Ettha ca yo ciraṃ gantvā vā caṅkamitvā vā aparabhāge ṭhito iti paṭisañcikkhati “caṅkamanakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a:381_0: Yo sajjhāyaṃ vā karonto pañhaṃ vā vissajjento kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto ciraṃ ṭhatvā aparabhāge nisinno
atk-s0305a:381_1: iti paṭisañcikkhati “ṭhitakāle pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti,
atk-s0305a:382_0: Yo sajjhāyādikaraṇavaseneva ciraṃ nisīditvā aparabhāge nipanno iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a:383_0: Yo pana nipannakova sajjhāyaṃ karonto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikaronto niddaṃ okkamitvā aparabhāge uṭṭhāya iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a:383_2: ayaṃ sutte ca jāgarite ca sampajānakārī nāma.
atk-s0305a:384_1: “ayaṃ saddo nāma oṭṭhe ca paṭicca dante ca jivhañca tāluñca paṭicca cittassa ca tadanurūpaṃ payogaṃ paṭicca jāyatī”ti sato sampajāno bhāsati,
atk-s0305a:384_2: ciraṃ vā pana kālaṃ sajjhāyaṃ katvā dhammaṃ vā kathetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā parivattetvā pañhaṃ vā vissajjetvā
atk-s0305a:384_3: aparabhāge tuṇhībhūto iti paṭisañcikkhati “bhāsitakāle uppannā rūpārūpadhammā ettheva niruddhā”ti ayaṃ
atk-s0305a:385_0: Yo tuṇhībhūto ciraṃ dhammaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikatvā aparabhāge iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0305a:385_5: Evamettha asammohasampajaññaṃ tassa vasena sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-s0305a:387_1: Tatiye evameva panidhekacceti so kira bhikkhu kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā ito cito ca āhiṇḍati,
atk-s0305a:387_4: Tasmāti yasmā saṃkhittena desanaṃ yācasi, tasmā.
atk-s0305a:389_1: Catutthe dhammavinayoti dhammoti vā vinayoti vā ubhayametaṃ satthusāsanasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0305a:389_4: Samāhitā ekaggacittāti upacārappanāvasena sammā ṭhapitacittā ca ekaggacittā ca.
atk-s0305a:389_5: Imasmiṃ sutte navakabhikkhūhi ceva khīṇāsavehi ca bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā,
atk-s0305a:391_11: attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānāti attho.
atk-s0305a:391_12: Mahantaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvāti uddhanasaṇṭhānena ṭhitesu tīsu leḍḍūsu “ito sene āgacchante ito nikkhamissāmi,
atk-s0305a:391_13: ito āgacchante ito”ti sallakkhetvā tesu ekaṃ leḍḍuṃ abhiruhitvā aṭṭhāsi avadamāno.
atk-s0305a:391_14: Sannayhāti khurappaṃ sannayhamāno viya sannayhitvā suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0305a:391_15: Bahuāgato kho myāyanti “mayhaṃ atthāya ayaṃ bahutaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0305a:391_17: idāni maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti ñatvā dāruguḷo viya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi,
atk-s0305a:391_19: Uraṃ paccatāḷesīti “ekappahāreneva lāpassa sīsaṃ chinditvā gahessāmī”ti pakkhandattā vegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ leḍḍusmiṃ uraṃ patāḷesi.
atk-s0305a:391_21: Atha lāpo “diṭṭhā vata sattuno piṭṭhī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho tassa hadaye aparāparaṃ caṅkami.
atk-s0305a:393_3: Lepaṃ oḍḍentīti vaṭarukkhakhīrādīhi yojetvā lepaṃ karonti,
atk-s0305a:393_4: taṃ makkaṭānaṃ dhuvagamanaṭṭhānanti sallakkhetvā rukkhasākhādīsu ṭhapenti.
atk-s0305a:393_5: Pañcoḍḍitoti pañcasu ṭhānesu kājadaṇḍakaṃ pavesetvā gahetabbā kājasikkā viya oḍḍito.
atk-s0305a:395_8: Bahuṃ gaṇhātīti ekaggahaṇena bahuṃ gaṇhantopi punappunaṃ gaṇhantopi bahuṃ gaṇhateva.
atk-s0305a:395_9: Abhihārānanti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā ukkhipitvā abhihaṭānaṃ dāyānaṃ.
atk-s0305a:395_11: Nimittaṃ na uggaṇhātīti “imaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ vā āhacca ṭhita”nti na jānāti,
atk-s0305a:395_12: attano cittassa nimittaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0305a:397_1: Navame beḷuvagāmaketi vesāliyā samīpe evaṃnāmako pādagāmo atthi, tasmiṃ.
atk-s0305a:397_3: Sandiṭṭhāti tattha tattha saṅgamma diṭṭhamattā nātidaḷhamittā.
atk-s0305a:397_5: Yesaṃ yattha yattha evarūpā bhikkhū atthi,
atk-s0305a:397_6: te tattha tattha vassaṃ upethāti attho.
atk-s0305a:398_6: Atha nesaṃ ‘satthā parinibbāyanto amhākaṃ satimattampi na adāsi.
atk-s0305a:398_8: na evaṃ dūre vaseyyāmā’ti vippaṭisāro bhaveyya.
atk-s0305a:398_9: Vesāliyā samantā pana vassaṃ vasantā māsassa aṭṭha vāre āgantvā dhammaṃ suṇissanti,
atk-s0305a:399_4: Sato sampajāno adhivāsesīti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a:399_5: Avihaññamānoti vedanānuvattanavasena aparāparaṃ parivattanaṃ akaronto apīḷiyamāno adukkhiyamāno ca adhivāsesi.
atk-s0305a:399_7: Anapaloketvāti ajānāpetvāva ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0305a:399_11: Yena jīvitaṃ saṅkharīyati chijjamānaṃ ghaṭetvā ṭhapīyati,
atk-s0305a:399_14: Adhiṭṭhāyāti adhiṭṭhahitvā pavattetvā jīvitaṭhapanasamatthaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjeyyanti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0305a:400_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā ito pubbe phalasamāpattiṃ na samāpajjatīti?
atk-s0305a:400_4: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamattassa kaṭṭhapātena vā kaṭhalapātena vā chinnasevālo viya udakaṃ,
atk-s0305a:400_6: Yā pana rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā mahāvipassanāvasena samāpannā samāpatti,
atk-s0305a:400_8: Yathā nāma purisena pokkharaṇiṃ ogāhetvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca suṭṭhu apabyuḷhasevālo cirena udakaṃ ottharati,
atk-s0305a:400_9: evameva tato vuṭṭhitassa cirena vedanā uppajjati.
atk-s0305a:400_10: Iti bhagavā taṃdivasaṃ mahābodhipallaṅke abhinavaṃ vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapento viya rūpasattakaṃ arūpasattakañca
atk-s0305a:400_11: niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā cuddasahākārehi sannetvā mahāvipassanāya vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā “dasamāse mā
atk-s0305a:400_13: samāpattivikkhambhitā vedanā dasa māse na uppajjiyeva.
atk-s0305a:401_0: Gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā puna vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0305a:401_1: Madhurakajāto viyāti sañjātagarubhāvo sañjātathaddhabhāvo sūle uttāsitapuriso viya.
atk-s0305a:401_4: Dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhantīti satipaṭṭhānadhammā mayhaṃ pākaṭā na hontīti dīpeti.
atk-s0305a:402_0: Anantaraṃ abāhiranti dhammavasena vā puggalavasena vā ubhayaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0305a:402_1: “Ettakaṃ dhammaṃ parassa na desessāmī”ti hi cintento dhammaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a:402_2: “ettakaṃ parassa desessāmī”ti cintento bāhiraṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a:402_3: “Imassa puggalassa desessāmī”ti cintento pana puggalaṃ abbhantaraṃ karoti nāma,
atk-s0305a:402_4: “imassa na desessāmī”ti cintento puggalaṃ bāhiraṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0305a:402_6: Ācariyamuṭṭhīti yathā bāhirakānaṃ ācariyamuṭṭhi nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a:402_7: daharakāle kassaci akathetvā pacchimakāle maraṇamañce nipannā piyamanāpassa antevāsikassa kathenti,
atk-s0305a:402_8: evaṃ tathāgatassa “idaṃ mahallakakāle pacchimaṭhāne kathessāmī”ti muṭṭhiṃ katvā pariharitvā ṭhapitaṃ kiñci natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:403_0: Ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghanti ahameva bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmīti vā,
atk-s0305a:403_1: mamuddesikoti ahaṃ uddisitabbaṭṭhena uddeso assāti mamuddesiko,
atk-s0305a:403_2: mameva uddissitvā maṃ paccāsīsamāno bhikkhusaṅgho hotu mama accayena mā vā ahosi,
atk-s0305a:403_3: yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotūti iti vā pana yassa assāti attho.
atk-s0305a:403_4: Na evaṃ hotīti bodhipallaṅkeyeva issāmaccherānaṃ vigatattā evaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0305a:403_9: Maññeti jarasakaṭaṃ viya veṭhamissakena maññe yāpeti,
atk-s0305a:404_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ pakāsento yasmiṃ ānanda samayetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:404_3: Tasmātihānandāti yasmā iminā phalasamāpattivihārena phāsu hoti,
atk-s0305a:404_4: tasmā tumhepi tadatthāya evaṃ viharathāti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:404_5: Attadīpāti mahāsamuddagatā dīpaṃ viya attānaṃ dīpaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ katvā viharatha.
atk-s0305a:404_9: Ettha ca dhammoti navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:404_15: Evaṃ sabbaṃ tamasotaṃ chinditvā ativiya agge uttamabhāve ete, ānanda,
atk-s0305a:404_19: sabbesaṃ tesaṃ catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissantīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0305a:406_1: Dasame tenupasaṅkamīti tasmiṃ upassaye kammaṭṭhānakammikā bhikkhuniyo atthi,
atk-s0305a:406_3: Uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesanti pubbavisesato aparaṃ uḷāravisesaṃ.
atk-s0305a:407_2: Bahiddhā vā cittaṃ vikkhipatīti bahiddhā vā puthuttārammaṇe cittuppādo vikkhipati.
atk-s0305a:407_3: Kismiñcideva pasādanīye nimitte cittaṃ paṇidahitabbanti evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe ca līnatte ca bahiddhāvikkhepe
atk-s0305a:407_5: kismiñcideva pasādanīye pasādāvahe buddhādīsu aññatarasmiṃ ṭhāne kammaṭṭhānacittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:407_6: Cittaṃ samādhiyatīti ārammaṇe sammā ādhiyati suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ ṭhapiyati.
atk-s0305a:407_10: Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretīti kilesavitakkaṃ na vitakketi,
atk-s0305a:407_13: Ajjhattaṃ satimā sukhamasmīti gocarajjhatte pavattāya satiyā “satimāhamasmi sukhito cā”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:408_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa mahantaṃ ucchubhāraṃ ukkhipitvā yantasālaṃ nentassa kilantakilantakāle
atk-s0305a:408_4: bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā ucchukhaṇḍaṃ khāditvā puna ukkhipitvā gamanaṃ hoti;
atk-s0305a:408_5: evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ uggahitakammaṭṭhānassa kāyapariḷāhādīsu uppannesu taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0305a:408_6: buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā kammaniyaṃ katvā bhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a:408_8: Tassa pana purisassa ucchubhāraṃ yantasālaṃ netvā pīḷetvā rasapānaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0305a:408_9: matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahattaṃ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:409_0: Bahiddhāti mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya bahi aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe.
atk-s0305a:409_2: Atha pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānātīti ettha kammaṭṭhānavasena vā sarīravasena vā desanāvasena vā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:410_0: Tattha kammaṭṭhāne tāva kammaṭṭhānassa abhiniveso pure nāma,
atk-s0305a:410_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā kilesapariḷāhassa vā līnattassa vā bahiddhāvikkhepassa vā
atk-s0305a:410_3: uppajjituṃ okāsaṃ adento sudantagoṇe yojetvā sārento viya caturassacchidde sutacchitaṃ caturassaghaṭikaṃ
atk-s0305a:410_4: pakkhipanto viya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā atiṭṭhanto alagganto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:410_5: so puresaṅkhātassa kammaṭṭhānābhinivesassa pacchāsaṅkhātassa arahattassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a:411_0: Sarīre pana pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbāni pure nāma,
atk-s0305a:411_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu pādaṅgulīnaṃ aggapabbaaṭṭhikesu abhinivisitvā byābhaṅgiyā yavakalāpaṃ mocento viya
atk-s0305a:411_3: vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena aṭṭhīni pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ vāretvā
atk-s0305a:411_5: so puresaṅkhātānaṃ aggapādaṅgulipabbānaṃ pacchāsaṅkhātassa sīsakaṭāhassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a:412_2: Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsavasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto antarā kilesapariḷāhādīnaṃ
atk-s0305a:412_3: uppattiṃ vāretvā yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0305a:412_4: So puresaṅkhātānaṃ kesānaṃ pacchāsaṅkhātassa matthaluṅgassa ca vasena pacchā pure asaṃkhittaṃ vimuttaṃ appaṇihitanti pajānāti nāma.
atk-s0305a:413_3: Imassa hi bhikkhuno yathā nāma purisassa guḷabhāraṃ labhitvā attano gāmaṃ atiharantassa antarā aṭṭhapetvāva
atk-s0305a:413_4: uccaṅge pakkhittāni guḷakhaṇḍādīni khādanīyāni khādantassa attano gāmeyeva otaraṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:413_5: evameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ āraddhabhāvanassa kāyapariḷāhādīnaṃ uppattiṃ vāretvā kammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā,
atk-s0305a:413_7: Tassa pana purisassa taṃ guḷabhāraṃ attano gāmaṃ netvā ñātīhi saddhiṃ paribhogo viya imassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0305a:413_8: kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā arahattaṃ pattassa phalasamāpattisukhānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:417_1: Dutiyavaggassa dutiye nālandāyanti nālandāti evaṃnāmake nagare,
atk-s0305a:417_5: So bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasanno tasmiṃ uyyāne kuṭileṇamaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhagavato vihāraṃ katvā niyyātesi.
atk-s0305a:417_6: So vihāro jīvakambavanaṃ viya pāvārikambavanantveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0305a:418_4: Sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe arahattamaggañāṇe vā arahattamaggeneva hi buddhaguṇā nippadesā gahitā honti,
atk-s0305a:419_1: Ayañhi uḷārasaddo “uḷārāni khādanīyāni khādantī”tiādīsu madhure āgacchati.
atk-s0305a:419_2: “Uḷārāya khalu bhavaṃ vacchāyano samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsāya pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0305a:419_7: Ekaṃso gahitoti anussavena vā ācariyaparamparāya vā itikirāya vā piṭakasampadānena vā ākāraparivitakkena
atk-s0305a:419_8: vā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā vā takkahetu vā nayahetu vā akathetvā paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viya
atk-s0305a:419_12: vane unnādayantena sīhena viya uttamanādo naditoti attho.
atk-s0305a:420_0: Kiṃ nu te sāriputtāti imaṃ desanaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0305a:420_2: Ekacco hi sīhanādaṃ naditvā attano sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:420_5: Yathā dhamamānaṃ aparisuddhaṃ lohaṃ jhāyitvā aṅgāro hoti,
atk-s0305a:420_7: Eko sīhanāde anuyogaṃ dāpiyamāno dātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:420_11: Tena naṃ bhagavā “anuyogakkhamo aya”nti ñatvā sīhanāde anuyogadāpanatthaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:421_0: Tattha sabbe teti sabbe te tayā.
atk-s0305a:421_3: maggasamādhinā phalasamādhinā lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā evaṃsamādhīti attho.
atk-s0305a:421_5: Evaṃvihārinoti ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahitopi puna kasmā gahitameva gaṇhatīti ce.
atk-s0305a:421_8: Tasmā evaṃ nirodhasamāpattivihārino te bhagavanto ahesunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:422_5: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:422_6: Aniccānupassanādikā satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkavasena pariccattāhi niccasaññādīhi vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:422_7: Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:422_8: Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni maggānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā paṭipassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0305a:422_9: Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0305a:422_10: Iti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ vimuttīnaṃ vasena evaṃ vimuttāti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0305a:423_0: Kiṃ pana te sāriputta ye te bhavissantīti atītā tāva niruddhā apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gatā dīpasikhā viya nibbutā,
atk-s0305a:423_1: evaṃ niruddhe apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gate tvaṃ kathaṃ jānissasi,
atk-s0305a:423_2: anāgatabuddhānaṃ pana guṇā kiṃ tayā attano cittena paricchinditvā viditāti pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a:424_0: Kiṃ pana tyāhaṃ sāriputta etarahīti anāgatāpi buddhā ajātā anibbattā anuppannā,
atk-s0305a:424_2: Tesañhi jānanaṃ apade ākāse padadassanaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0305a:424_6: kiṃ pana mayhaṃ guṇā attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā tayāti anuyuñjanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a:424_7: Thero pana pucchitapucchite “no hetaṃ bhante”ti paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0305a:425_2: Kiṃ so attano viditaṭṭhāne paṭikkhepaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:425_6: Thero kira anuyoge āraddhe evaṃ aññāsi “nāyaṃ anuyogo sāvakapāramīñāṇe,
atk-s0305a:425_7: sabbaññutaññāṇe pana ayaṃ anuyogo”ti attano sāvakapāramīñāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ akatvāva aviditaṭṭhāne sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭikkhepaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:425_9: bhagavā mayhaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttikāraṇajānanasamatthaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0305a:426_1: Atha kiñcarahīti atha kasmā evaṃ ñāṇe asati tayā evaṃ kathitanti vadati.
atk-s0305a:426_2: Dhammanvayoti dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassa anuyogaṃ anugantvā uppannaṃ anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito,
atk-s0305a:426_3: sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvāva iminā ākārena jānāmi bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0305a:426_5: Yathā ca sabbaññutaññāṇassa pamāṇaṃ vā pariyanto vā natthi,
atk-s0305a:426_8: iminā anuttaro iminā anuttaro satthā”ti jānāti.
atk-s0305a:427_0: Idāni taṃ nayaggāhaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ upamaṃ dassento seyyathāpi bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:427_1: Tattha yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpapākārādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā,
atk-s0305a:427_4: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā paccantimaṃ nagaranti āha.
atk-s0305a:427_8: Bahudvāre hi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:427_10: Therassa ca paññāya sadiso añño natthi,
atk-s0305a:427_11: tasmā attano paṇḍitabhāvassa opammatthaṃ ekaṃyeva dovārikaṃ dassetuṃ “ekadvāra”nti āha.
atk-s0305a:428_6: Cetaso upakkileseti pañcanīvaraṇā cittaṃ upakkilissanti kiliṭṭhaṃ karonti upatāpenti viheṭhenti,
atk-s0305a:428_8: Paññāya dubbalīkaraṇeti nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na denti,
atk-s0305a:428_10: Supatiṭṭhitacittāti catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā hutvā.
atk-s0305a:428_11: Satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtanti satta bojjhaṅge yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvā.
atk-s0305a:428_12: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti arahattaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsūti dasseti.
atk-s0305a:429_6: Dīghabhāṇakamahāsīvatthero panāha “satipaṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ gahetvā bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyya,
atk-s0305a:429_8: Iti thero sabbabuddhānaṃ nīvaraṇappahāne satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sambodhiyañca majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇarajatānaṃ viya nānattābhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0305a:430_14: nagaraṃ pavisanakanikkhamanakā oḷārikapāṇā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannā buddhā,
atk-s0305a:430_15: dovārikassa tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ pākaṭabhāvo viya āyasmato sāriputtassa atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ buddhānaṃ sīlasamathādīhi pākaṭabhāvo.
atk-s0305a:430_17: “evamahaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammanvayena nayaggāhena jānāmī”ti attano sīhanādassa anuyogo dinno hoti.
atk-s0305a:431_4: “pubbaṇhe me kathita”nti mā majjhanhikādīsu na kathayittha,
atk-s0305a:431_5: “ajja vā me kathita”nti mā paradivasādīsu na kathayitthāti attho.
atk-s0305a:431_6: Sā pahīyissatīti “sāriputtasadisopi nāma ñāṇajavanasampanno sāvako buddhānaṃ cittācāraṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:431_7: evaṃ appameyyā tathāgatā”ti cintentānaṃ yā tathāgate kaṅkhā vā vimati vā,
atk-s0305a:433_2: Nālakagāmaketi rājagahassa avidūre attano kulasantake evaṃnāmake gāme.
atk-s0305a:433_3: Cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko,
atk-s0305a:433_4: taṃ bhikkhū anupasampannakāle “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṃsu.
atk-s0305a:434_1: bhagavā kira vutthavasso veḷuvagāmakā nikkhamitvā “sāvatthiṃ gamissāmī”ti āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0305a:434_2: Dhammasenāpati bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ gato,
atk-s0305a:434_3: so tattha antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññāpetvā pāde
atk-s0305a:434_5: Athassa yathā paricchedena tato vuṭṭhitassa ayaṃ parivitakko udapādi “buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti,
atk-s0305a:434_7: tato “aggasāvakā paṭhama”nti ñatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0305a:434_8: So “sattāhameva me āyusaṅkhārā pavattissantī”ti ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0305a:435_2: ahaṃ kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti punappunaṃ cintento mātaraṃ ārabbha satiṃ uppādesi –
atk-s0305a:435_3: “mayhaṃ mātā sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ mātā hutvāpi buddhadhammasaṅghesu appasannā,
atk-s0305a:435_6: Sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā “kassa desanāya abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “mameva dhammadesanāya bhavissati,
atk-s0305a:435_11: Tathā hissa samacittasuttantadesanādivase koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0305a:435_13: aññesu ca ṭhānesu anekā abhisamayā dissanti,
atk-s0305a:435_14: there ca cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattāneva asīti kulasahassāni,
atk-s0305a:435_16: Tasmā mātaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā jātovarakeyeva parinibbāyissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā “ajjeva bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0305a:436_0: Bhikkhū senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya therassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0305a:436_1: Thero senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā divāṭṭhānadvāre ṭhatvā divāṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā “idaṃ dāni pacchimadassanaṃ,
atk-s0305a:436_2: puna āgamanaṃ natthī”ti pañcasatabhikkhūhi parivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “anujānātu me bhante bhagavā,
atk-s0305a:436_6: Buddhā pana yasmā “parinibbāhī”ti vutte maraṇavaṇṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇentīti,
atk-s0305a:436_7: “mā parinibbāhī”ti vutte vaṭṭassa guṇaṃ kathentīti micchādiṭṭhikā dosaṃ āropessanti,
atk-s0305a:436_16: idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātikānaṃ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0305a:437_1: “satthā mayhaṃ iddhivikubbanapubbaṅgamaṃ dhammadesanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0305a:437_2: ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a:437_3: puna dvitālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi,
atk-s0305a:437_4: etenupāyena sattatālappamāṇaṃ abbhuggantvā anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0305a:437_7: Uparimena vā heṭṭhimena vā upaḍḍhakāyena katheti adissamānenapi dissamānenapi,
atk-s0305a:437_15: kālena mahābrahmāti evaṃ anekāni pāṭihāriyasatāni dassento dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0305a:437_17: Thero oruyha dasabalassa pāde vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:438_0: Thero alattakavaṇṇe hatthe pasāretvā satthu suvaṇṇakacchapasadise pāde gopphakesu gahetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0305a:438_1: imesaṃ pādānaṃ vandanatthāya kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūritā,
atk-s0305a:438_3: ito dāni paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena na puna ekaṭṭhāne sannipāto samāgamo atthi,
atk-s0305a:438_5: anekehi buddhasatasahassehi paviṭṭhaṃ ajaraṃ amaraṃ khemaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ abhayaṃ nibbānapuraṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0305a:438_6: sace me kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a:438_11: na kho pana te kiñci kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā mayhaṃ aruccanakaṃ atthi,
atk-s0305a:439_0: Iti bhagavatā anuññātasamanantaraṃ satthu pāde vanditvā uṭṭhitamatte āyasmante sāriputte sinerucakkavāḷahimavantaparibhaṇḍapabbate dhārayamānāpi –
atk-s0305a:439_1: “ajja imaṃ guṇarāsiṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya ekappahāreneva viravamānā mahāpathavī yāva udakapariyantā akampi,
atk-s0305a:440_1: “dhammasenāpatiṃ paṭipādessāmī”ti dhammāsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhakuṭiabhimukho gantvā maṇiphalake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:440_2: Thero tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā –
atk-s0305a:440_3: “bhagavā ito kappasatasahassādhikassa asaṅkhyeyyassa upari anomadassīsammāsambuddhassa pādamūle nipajjitvā tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ patthesiṃ,
atk-s0305a:440_8: Puna tumhākaṃ dassanaṃ natthī”ti vatvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha yāva dassanavisayā abhimukhova paṭikkamitvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a:440_9: Puna mahāpathavī dhāretuṃ asakkontī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampi.
atk-s0305a:441_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe catassopi parisā sammāsambuddhaṃ ekakaṃyeva jetavane ohāya niravasesā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:441_7: passissāma na”nti nagaradvārāni nirokāsāni karontā nikkhamitvā gandhamālādihatthā kese vikiritvā –
atk-s0305a:441_11: kassa hatthe satthāraṃ ṭhapetvā thero pakkanto”tiādinā nayena paridevantā rodantā theraṃ anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:442_1: “sabbesaṃ anatikkamanīyo esa maggo”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā – “tumhepi, āvuso,
atk-s0305a:442_3: mā dasabale pamādaṃ āpajjitthā”ti bhikkhusaṅghampi nivattetvā attano parisāyeva saddhiṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0305a:442_6: idaṃ idāni gamanaṃ na puna paccāgamanāyā”ti paridevantā anubandhiṃsuyeva. Tepi –
atk-s0305a:443_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sabbattha ekarattivāsena antarāmagge sattāhaṃ manussānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto sāyaṃ
atk-s0305a:443_2: Atha uparevato nāma therassa bhāgineyyo bahigāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:443_21: daharakāle pabbajitvā mahallakakāle gihī hotukāmo”ti cintentī jātovarakaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0305a:443_22: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāretvā daṇḍadīpikā jāletvā therassa pāhesi.
atk-s0305a:444_0: Thero bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ pāsādaṃ āruyha jātovarakaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi,
atk-s0305a:444_2: Tesu gatamattesuyeva therassa kharo ābādho uppajji,
atk-s0305a:444_7: “mama puttassa pavatti mayhaṃ na ruccatī”ti attano vasanagabbhadvāraṃ nissāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:445_0: Cattāro mahārājāno “dhammasenāpati kuhiṃ viharatī”ti olokentā nālakagāme jātovarake parinibbānamañce nipanno,
atk-s0305a:445_8: Tesaṃ gatāvasāne teneva nayena sakko devānamindo.
atk-s0305a:446_0: Brāhmaṇī devatānaṃ āgamanañca gamanañca disvā “ke nu kho ete mama puttaṃ vanditvā gacchantī”ti therassa gabbhadvāraṃ gantvā “tāta, cunda,
atk-s0305a:446_11: amhākaṃ satthu paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya khaggahatthā hutvā ārakkhaṃ akaṃsūti.
atk-s0305a:446_16: amhākaṃ satthu tāvatiṃsato otaraṇakāle pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā otiṇṇoti.
atk-s0305a:446_17: Tassa tāta gatāvasāne jotayamāno viya ko āgatoti? Upāsike,
atk-s0305a:446_18: tuyhaṃ bhagavā ca satthā ca mahābrahmā nāma esoti.
atk-s0305a:446_22: ete nāma kira amhākaṃ satthu jātadivase cattāro mahābrahmāno mahāpurisaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsūti.
atk-s0305a:447_2: kīdiso vata mayhaṃ puttassa bhagavato satthu ānubhāvo bhavissatī”ti cintayantiyā sahasā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari. Thero –
atk-s0305a:447_4: ayaṃ dāni kālo dhammadesanāyā”ti cintetvā “kiṃ cintesi mahāupāsike”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:447_6: satthu panassa kīdiso bhavissatīti idaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0305a:447_9: mayhaṃ satthujātakkhaṇe mahābhinikkhamane sambodhiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattane ca dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0305a:447_10: Sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samo nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:447_11: itipi so bhagavāti vitthāretvā buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0305a:448_0: Brāhmaṇī piyaputtassa dhammadesanāpariyosāne sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya puttaṃ āha –
atk-s0305a:448_3: evarūpaṃ nāma amataṃ mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na adāsī”ti. Thero –
atk-s0305a:448_4: “dinnaṃ dāni me mātu rūpasāriyā brāhmaṇiyā posāvanikamūlaṃ,
atk-s0305a:449_1: “āvuso catucattālīsaṃ vo vassāni mayā saddhiṃ vicarantānaṃ yaṃ me kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā na rocetha,
atk-s0305a:449_3: amhākaṃ chāyā viya tumhe amuñcitvā vicarantānaṃ aruccanakaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0305a:449_5: Atha thero mahācīvaraṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā mukhaṃ pidhāya dakkhiṇena passena nipanno satthā viya nava anupubbasamāpattiyo
atk-s0305a:449_6: anulomapaṭilomato samāpajjitvā puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva catutthajjhānā samāpajji.
atk-s0305a:449_7: Tato vuṭṭhāya anantaraṃyeva mahāpathaviṃ unnādento anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0305a:450_2: na kiñci kathetī”ti uṭṭhāya piṭṭhipāde parimajjantī parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā mahāsaddaṃ kurumānā pādesu nipatitvā –
atk-s0305a:450_3: “tāta mayaṃ ito pubbe tava guṇaṃ na jānimhā,
atk-s0305a:450_4: idāni pana taṃ ādiṃ katvā anekasate anekasahasse anekasatasahasse bhikkhū imasmiṃ nivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojetuṃ na labhimhā,
atk-s0305a:450_6: vihārasataṃ vihārasahassaṃ kāretuṃ na labhimhā”ti yāva aruṇuggamanā paridevi.
atk-s0305a:450_7: Aruṇe uggatamatteyeva suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivarāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭiyo mahātulāya tulāpetvā –
atk-s0305a:451_2: pañca kūṭāgārasatāni pañca agghikasatāni ca māpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0305a:451_3: Iti upāsikāya kāritāni ca vissakammena nimmitāni ca sabbānipi dvesahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0305a:451_4: Tato nagaramajjhe sāramayaṃ mahāmaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā maṇḍapamajjhe mahākūṭāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni parivārasaṅkhepena ṭhapetvā sādhukīḷikaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:452_1: “ahaṃ therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇapupphānaṃ tayo kumbhe kāresi.
atk-s0305a:452_2: “Therassa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti sakko devarājā aḍḍhateyyakoṭināṭakehi parivārito otari.
atk-s0305a:452_4: Tattha sāpi upāsikā paṭikkamamānā garubhārattā ekamantaṃ apasakkituṃ asakkontī manussānaṃ antare pati.
atk-s0305a:452_6: Sā tattheva kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0305a:452_7: Nibbattakkhaṇeyevassā ratanakkhandho viya tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvo ahosi saṭṭhisakaṭapūrappamāṇaalaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā accharāsahassaparivāritā.
atk-s0305a:452_11: kiṃ nu kho me kammaṃ kata”nti cintayamānā addasa –
atk-s0305a:452_12: “mayā sāriputtattherassa parinibbutaṭṭhāne tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi pūjā katā,
atk-s0305a:452_15: theraṃ nissāya laddhaṃ idāni puññavipākaṃ manussānaṃ kathessāmī”ti saha vimāneneva otari.
atk-s0305a:453_6: Tampi vimānaṃ tāvadeva āgantvā therassa dārucitakamatthake vehāsaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0305a:453_7: Devadhītā vimānaṃ ākāseyeva ṭhapetvā pathaviṃ otari.
atk-s0305a:453_11: tīhi suvaṇṇapupphakumbhehi theraṃ pūjaṃ katvā manussehi madditā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattā,
atk-s0305a:453_14: puññāni karothā”ti kusalakiriyāya vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā therassa citakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā attano devaṭṭhānaṃyeva gatā.
atk-s0305a:454_0: Mahājanopi sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷitvā sabbagandhehi citakaṃ akāsi,

atk-s0305a:550_1: Arahattamaggassa hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni paṭhamaantarāparinibbāyissa vipassanindriyāni,
atk-s0305a:551_5: Imesu pana tīsupi suttesu pubbabhāgavipassanindriyāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0305a:553_1: Aṭṭhame tato mudutarehīti maggaphalavasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:559_1: Tatiyavaggassa dutiye itthindriyantiādīsu itthibhāve indaṭṭhaṃ karotīti itthindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:559_5: Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi “kati nu kho vaṭṭindriyānī”ti kathā udapādi,
atk-s0305a:559_6: atha bhagavā vaṭṭindriyāni dassento tīṇimāni bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0305a:561_1: Tatiye anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti “anamatagge saṃsāre ajānitapubbaṃ dhammaṃ jānissāmī”ti paṭipannassa sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:561_2: Aññindriyanti tesaṃyeva ñātadhammānaṃ ājānanākārena sotāpattiphalādīsu chasu ṭhānesu uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:561_4: Tattha tattha tena tenākārena uppannassa ñāṇassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0305a:561_6: Saṅghamajjhasmiñhi “kati nu kho lokuttarindriyānī”ti kathā udapādi,
atk-s0305a:563_1: Catutthe tato mudutarehīti vipassanato nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:563_2: Samattāni hi pañcindriyāni arahattamaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāma honti,
atk-s0305a:563_8: Idhāpi purimanayeneva arahattamagge ṭhatvā pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni.
atk-s0305a:564_0: Yathā pana purimanaye sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā tīṇi nissakkāni,
atk-s0305a:564_2: Sakadāgāmimaggassa hi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni,
atk-s0305a:564_3: sotāpattimaggassa ca tehi vipassanindriyehi mudutarāni ekabījiādīnaṃ maggassa vipassanindriyāni.
atk-s0305a:565_0: Ettha ca ekabījītiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:565_3: idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a:565_4: so ekaññeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:566_0: Yo pana dve tayo bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:566_3: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a:566_4: so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0305a:566_8: yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsaranto pana kolaṃkolova hoti.
atk-s0305a:567_4: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
atk-s0305a:567_5: so sattakkhattuṃ deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0305a:568_3: ettakaṃ sattakkhattuparamo”ti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0305a:569_0: Ko pana nesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti?
atk-s0305a:569_5: Tattha “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti,
atk-s0305a:569_6: upari tayo maggā anupanissayā uppannāti vacanaṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:569_7: “Paṭhamamaggo niyametī”ti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:569_8: “Upari tayo maggā niyamentī”ti vāde paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjati.
atk-s0305a:569_9: “Tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyametī”ti vādo pana yujjati.
atk-s0305a:569_10: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0305a:570_0: Ekacco hi sotāpanno vaṭṭajjhāsayo hoti vaṭṭābhirato punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva vicarati sandissati.
atk-s0305a:570_6: nāgadatto devaputtoti ime hi ettakā janā vaṭṭajjhāsayā vaṭṭābhiratā ādito paṭṭhāya cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissanti,
atk-s0305a:570_9: yopi manussesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:570_10: yopi devaloke nibbatto devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ aparāparaṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:570_13: kālena manusse saṃsaritvā pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇantova idha gahito.
atk-s0305a:570_14: Tasmā sattakkhattuparamoti idaṃ idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassa nāmaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:571_0: Dhammānusārī saddhānusārīti ettha pana imasmiṃ sāsane lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattentassa dve dhurāni,
atk-s0305a:571_9: Tattha yo bhikkhu “sace saddhāya sakkā nibbattetuṃ,
atk-s0305a:571_10: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0305a:571_12: Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto nāma hutvā ekabījī kolaṃkolo sattakkhattuparamoti tividho hoti.
atk-s0305a:571_13: Tattha ekeko dukkhāpaṭipadādivasena catubbidhabhāvaṃ āpajjatīti saddhādhurena dvādasa janā honti.
atk-s0305a:572_1: nibbattessāmi lokuttaramagga”nti paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
atk-s0305a:572_3: Phalakkhaṇe pana paññāvimutto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedena dvādasabhedova hoti.
atk-s0305a:572_4: Evaṃ dve maggaṭṭhā phalakkhaṇe catuvīsati sotāpannā hontīti.
atk-s0305a:573_0: Tipiṭakatissatthero kira “tīṇi piṭakāni sodhessāmī”ti paratīraṃ gato.
atk-s0305a:573_1: Taṃ eko kuṭumbiko catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0305a:573_7: bhaddantaṃ pana nissāya mayā sāsanassa guṇo ñāto,
atk-s0305a:573_10: “yo bhikkhu catuvīsati sotāpanne dvādasa sakadāgāmī aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmī dvādasa arahante dassetvā dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0305a:575_1: Pañcame cakkhu ca taṃ cakkhudvāre nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti cakkhundriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:575_4: Imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamasuttañceva chaṭṭhādīni ca pañcāti cha suttāni catusaccavasena kathitānīti.
atk-s0305a:579_1: Catutthavaggassa paṭhame sukhañca taṃ sahajātānaṃ ādhipateyyasaṅkhātena indaṭṭhena indriyañcāti sukhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0305a:581_9: Kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vāti ettha pana cakkhādayo cattāro pasādakāye vatthuṃ katvā uppattivasena kāyikanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0305a:585_1: Dasamaṃ yathādhammarasena paṭipāṭiyā vuttampi imasmiṃ indriyavibhaṅge sesasuttāni viya adesitattā uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:585_4: Dukkhindriyasamudayanti kaṇṭakena vā viddhassa maṅkulena vā daṭṭhassa paccattharaṇe vā valiyā phuṭṭhassa dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:586_0: Parato domanassindriyasamudayantiādīsupi tesaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇavaseneva samudayo veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:586_1: Pattacīvarādīnaṃ vā hi saṅkhārānaṃ saddhivihārikādīnaṃ vā sattānaṃ vināsena domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti tesaṃ vināsaṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:586_2: Subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā varasayane nipannassa hatthapādasambāhanatālavaṇṭavātādisamphassena sukhindriyaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:586_4: Vuttappakārānaṃ pana sattasaṅkhārānaṃ manāpānaṃ paṭilābhavasena somanassindriyaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:586_7: taṃ sattasaṅkhāresu majjhattākāraṃ tassa samudayoti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:587_0: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, idha,
atk-s0305a:587_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehītiādīsu pana ayaṃ ekatova vinicchayakathā –
atk-s0305a:587_3: dukkhindriyañhi paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nirujjhati pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:587_5: Evaṃ santepi tesaṃ atisayanirodhattā ayaṃ jhānesuyeva nirodho vutto.
atk-s0305a:587_10: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānupacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a:587_12: Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti paṭipakkhena avihatattā.
atk-s0305a:587_13: Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti,
atk-s0305a:587_14: sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ paṭipakkhena vihatattā.
atk-s0305a:587_15: Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassa domanassindriyassa yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati,
atk-s0305a:587_19: appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti.
atk-s0305a:587_21: Tathā tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhakāyassa siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a:587_23: Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso niruddhā.
atk-s0305a:587_24: Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti,
atk-s0305a:587_26: Tasmā “ettha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0305a:588_0: Yaṃ panettha tadatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharatīti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0305a:588_1: tattha alābhī samāno uppādanatthāya cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
atk-s0305a:592_1: Pañcamavaggassa paṭhame pacchātapeti pāsādacchāyāya puratthimadisaṃ paṭicchannattā pāsādassa pacchimadisābhāge ātapo hoti,
atk-s0305a:592_3: Piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamānoti yasmā sammāsambuddhassapi upādinnakasarīre uṇhakāle uṇhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0305a:592_6: Tasmā mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā sūriyarasmīhi piṭṭhiṃ otāpayamāno nisīdi.
atk-s0305a:593_0: Kiṃ pana buddharasmiyo madditvā sūriyarasmi anto pavisituṃ sakkotīti?
atk-s0305a:593_4: Yatheva hi ṭhitamajjhanhike parimaṇḍalāya chāyāya rukkhamūle nisinnassa kiñcāpi sūriyarasmiyo sarīraṃ na phusanti,
atk-s0305a:593_7: evaṃ sūriyarasmīsu buddharasmiyo madditvā anto pavisituṃ asakkuṇantīsupi satthā tejaṃ tāpento nisinnoti veditabbo.
atk-s0305a:594_1: Acchariyaṃ bhanteti thero bhagavato piṭṭhito mahācīvaraṃ otāretvā nisinnassa dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare
atk-s0305a:594_3: “evarūpepi nāma sarīre jarā paññāyatī”ti sañjātasaṃvego jaraṃ garahanto evamāha.
atk-s0305a:595_1: bhagavato tāva parisuddhoti yathā pakatiyā chavivaṇṇo parisuddho,
atk-s0305a:595_3: Tathāgatassa hi daharakāle saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya vihatavaliko kāyo hoti,
atk-s0305a:595_9: maṃsaṃ aṭṭhito muccitvā sithilabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tattha tattha olambati.
atk-s0305a:596_0: Sithilāni ca gattānīti aññesaṃ mukhe aṃsakūṭantarehi tesu tesu ṭhānesu valiyo santiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0305a:596_2: thero ca dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ antare valiyāvaṭṭakaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0305a:596_3: Sabbāni valiyajātānīti idampi attano pākaṭavasena evamāha –
atk-s0305a:596_4: satthu pana aññesaṃ viya valiyo nāma natthi.
atk-s0305a:596_5: Purato pabbhāro ca kāyoti satthā brahmujugatto,
atk-s0305a:596_6: devanagare samussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viyassa kāyo ujukameva uggato.
atk-s0305a:596_7: Mahallakakāle pana kāyo purato vaṅko hoti,
atk-s0305a:596_11: Dissati ca indriyānaṃ aññathattanti indriyāni nāma na cakkhuviññeyyāni.
atk-s0305a:596_16: imināva kāraṇena cakkhādīnañca indriyānaṃ aññathattena bhavitabbanti nayaggāhato evamāha.
atk-s0305a:596_17: Dhī taṃ jammi jare atthūti lāmake jare dhī taṃ tuyhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0305a:598_3: sotaṃ vā cakkhussāti evaṃ ekaṃ ekassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhoti.
atk-s0305a:598_4: Sace hi nīlādibhedaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ samodhānetvā sotindriyassa upaneyya –
atk-s0305a:598_5: “iṅgha tvaṃ tāva naṃ vavatthapehi vibhāvehi ‘kinnāmetaṃ ārammaṇa”’nti.
atk-s0305a:598_6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vināpi mukhena attano dhammatāya evaṃ vadeyya – “are,
atk-s0305a:598_8: vassasatampi vassasahassampi vassasatasahassampi paridhāvamāno aññatra mayā kuhiṃ etassa jānanakaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0305a:598_17: Evametāni aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ na paccanubhonti nāma.
atk-s0305a:599_3: Manova nesanti manodvārikajavanamanova etesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ rajjanādivasena anubhoti.
atk-s0305a:599_5: ettha rajjanaṃ vā dussanaṃ vā muyhanaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0305a:599_6: Ekasmiṃ pana dvāre javanaṃ rajjati vā dussati vā muyhati vā.
atk-s0305a:600_1: pañca kira dubbalabhojakā rājānaṃ sevitvā kicchena kasirena ekasmiṃ pañcakulike gāme parittakaṃ āyaṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0305a:600_3: addukahāpaṇo vā yottakahāpaṇo vā māsakahāpaṇo vā aṭṭhakahāpaṇo vā soḷasakahāpaṇo vā catusaṭṭhikahāpaṇo vā daṇḍoti ettakamattameva pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0305a:600_4: satavatthukaṃ pañcasatavatthukaṃ sahassavatthukaṃ mahābaliṃ rājāva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0305a:601_5: Rañño mahābaliggahaṇaṃ viya tesu dvāresu javanassa rajjanādīni veditabbāni.
atk-s0305a:602_5: Nāsakkhi pañhassa pariyantaṃ gahetunti pañhassa paricchedaṃ pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0305a:602_11: Nibbānaparāyaṇanti nibbānaṃ paraṃ ayanamassa parā gati,
atk-s0305a:603_5: Tasmiñhi samaye brāhmaṇassa paṭhamamaggena pañca akusalacittāni pahīnāni,
atk-s0305a:603_7: So aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā tattheva parinibbāyeyya.
atk-s0305a:603_8: Sace panassa puttadāraṃ anusāsantassa kammante vicārentassa jhānaṃ nassati,
atk-s0305a:603_10: anaṭṭhe pana nibaddhāti imaṃ jhānaanāgāmitaṃ sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0305a:605_1: Tatiye añjanavaneti añjanavaṇṇapupphānaṃ rukkhānaṃ ropitavane. Yaṃ,
atk-s0305a:605_4: taṃ saddhābalanti tañhi adhimokkhalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0305a:605_8: Evameva khoti tassā nadiyā ekasotaṃ viya saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāvasena etesaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:605_9: dve sotāni viya indaṭṭhaakampanaṭṭhehi indriyabalavasena nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0305a:607_4: Sādhu sādhūti therassa byākaraṇaṃ pasaṃsanto sādhukāraṃ deti.
atk-s0305a:609_3: Pubbakoṭṭhakaṃ ādiṃ katvā paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu phalindriyāneva kathitāni.
atk-s0305a:611_1: Dasame ime kho te dhammāti upari saha vipassanāya tayo maggā.
atk-s0305a:611_2: Ye me pubbe sutāva ahesunti ye dhammā mayā pubbe “arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāma atthī”ti kathentānaṃyeva sutā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0305a:611_3: Kāyena ca phusitvāti nāmakāyena ca phusitvā paṭilabhitvā.
atk-s0305a:611_4: Paññāya ca ativijjha passāmīti paccavekkhaṇapaññāya ca ativijjhitvā passāmi. Yā hissa, bhante,
atk-s0305a:611_6: Catūhi indriyehi sampayuttā saddhā heṭṭhā kathitāva,
atk-s0305a:615_0: 521. Chaṭṭhavaggassa paṭhame sūrenāti sūrabhāvena. Bodhāyāti bujjhanatthāya.
atk-s0305a:617_4: Tampi pana catukkindriyanissitaṃ katvā missakanti bhājetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0305a:619_1: Tatiye na heva kho kāyena phusitvā viharatīti na nāmakāyena phusitvā paṭilabhitvā viharati,
atk-s0305a:619_3: Paññāya ca ativijjha passatīti paccavekkhaṇapaññāya pana “upari arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāma atthī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0305a:621_1: Catutthe yāni kānici padāni bodhāya saṃvattantīti yāni kānici dhammapadāni,
atk-s0305a:623_1: Chaṭṭhe cittaṃ rakkhati āsavesu ca sāsavesu ca dhammesūti tebhūmakadhamme ārabbha āsavuppattiṃ vārento
atk-s0305a:623_2: āsavesu ca sāsavesu ca dhammesu cittaṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0305a:625_2: Kassapabuddhakāle kira taṃ leṇaṃ ekasmiṃ buddhantare pathaviyā vaḍḍhamānāya antobhūmigataṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0305a:625_3: Athekadivasaṃ eko sūkaro tassa chadanapariyantasamīpe paṃsuṃ khaṇi.
atk-s0305a:625_6: Eko vanacarako disvā “pubbe sīlavantehi paribhuttaṭṭhānena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0305a:625_7: paṭijaggissāmi na”nti samantato paṃsuṃ apanetvā leṇaṃ sodhetvā kuṭiparikkhepaṃ katvā dvāravātapānaṃ yojetvā
atk-s0305a:625_8: supariniṭṭhitasudhākammacittakammaṃ rajatapaṭṭasadisāya vālikāya santharitaṃ pariveṇaṃ katvā mañcapīṭhaṃ

atk-s0305a:682_3: Tattha yo bhikkhu mūlakammaṭṭhāne abhinivisitvā atilīnādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu cittassa okkamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā,

atk-s0305a:682_9: Tattha yo bhikkhu kesesu abhinivisitvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena kesādayo pariggaṇhanto catūsu ṭhānesu asajjanto yāva matthaluṅgā bhāvanaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0305a:682_10: ayampi yathā pure tathā pacchā viharati nāma.
